videos.description:

Hearing of God's Word before bedtime ushers in the presence of God in our hearts and environment as we sleep........Proverbs 22:16 "Train up a child in the way he should go and when he is old he will not depart from it." God's Blessings to you and your family always, Enjoy 🙏🏽❤️

1) Psalm 91- Safety of Abiding in the Presence of God
2) Psalm 27- Declaration of Faith
3) Psalm 61- Assurance of God's Eternal Protection
4) Psalm 140- Prayer for Deliverance 
5) Psalm 121- God the Help of those who seek Him
